comment: My favorite professor thus far. She is incredible. SO knowledgeable. She cares about her students and their success. Grades are not handed to you and she will be brutally honest with you. You cannot slack off. Homework every night - honestly, some of it was kind of fun because it was challenging. I worked very hard for my grade.

Best teacher ever. Very knowledgeable, has a lot of real world experience that she shares with you. I would take her again if I could. She really cares about her students. There is a lot of homework, but she gives opportunities to re-do assignments and helps you a lot.

This class comes off as impossible to pass on the first day, but once you get past that you'll see Prof. Quinn as the helpful, genuine, caring, motivating woman she is! It's not an easy A, but you will learn a lot from her experiences and about your determination to continue as a Com. Major. It honestly made me love PR even more! So grateful!

Professor Quinn is probably one of the most gracious professors I have ever met at KSU. You get out what you put in and she is way helpful. She is very passionate about the subject matter and wants you to be successful. She cares about her students and because of it she stays on you to give your best work. I walked away more inspired and motivated.

She was very understanding and very helpful, she even took student's feedback and made some changes. Material is very difficult and the work load was a lot. Think of this lower division class as an upper division and you'll be fine. Final is open notes. Pay attention and work hard and there's no reason you shouldn't get a B

Terrible at staying on point, constantly telling unrelated personal stories and loves to name drop the various "celebrities" she's met or worked with. Not a single lecture goes by where she won't inject her political or religious beliefs. Not offensive, just inappropriate. We got way behind, due to her lack of focus. Final was open-book though!
She was a good professor. This class in General is like learning English all over again. But you will have to put in the work to get your grade in this class.

She has a great sense of humor  and passion for teaching and sharing her professional experiences. Don t ever consider missing any of her classes because some of her test's question come from random things she says I'm class that are not on the book or PowerPoint. You have to read the chapters, pay attention in class otherwise, no chance to pass. She is very well organized and gives bonus quizzes! :) She is awesome and very knowledgeable.
I LOVE PROF QUINN!!! Do not take anyone else besides her. She is absoluetly wonderful. I cannot wait to take more classes from her. :)

BEST PROFESSOR I have ever had at KSU. I loved her! She is so helpful with assignments and really wants you to succeed and become a better writer. You MUST do the work and put in the effort but she will help you. Highly recommend!

She is my favorite professor by far and I've been in school for a while now! You definitely have to participate and do your assignments to keep up with what's going on in class, but it's worth it. This class will change how you write! It's incredible. She's a very understanding and competent teacher with tons of experience!
